title: Diamond Cascading Pendant - A Timeless Elegance
materials: G color). Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and longevity.
features: Features a cascading design with diamond-studded pendants suspended from a curved bar. The delicate setting highlights the brilliance of each diamond. The design is inspired by Jadau, a traditional Mughal jewelry technique.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold and sparkling white diamonds
creating a classic and luxurious contrast.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement of refined elegance. Suitable for both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
description: Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this pendant combines the timeless beauty of diamonds with a unique and eye-catching design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come.
